vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥησά (L, -σᾶ), ὁ
indecl.,
Rhesa: Luk.3:27.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27;
son of: Zerubbabel (G2216);
father of: Joanan (G2490)
§ Rhesa, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:27*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利撒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "頭"
所羅巴伯的兒子,耶穌基督的家譜 (路 3:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利撒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "头"
所罗巴伯的儿子,耶稣基督的家谱 (路 3:27)
